item.description:
This is a hike that our single members might enjoy. Charlie's Active Singles hikes are for active single people in their 30's through 50's and average up to 200 people per event! These events have been found to be fun and well planned!

Meet-up is at 8:15 AM at location of the hike. Hikers are usually split up into 3 different hiking skill levels (something like advanced, novice, and social) and the difficulty of the hike corresponds. The hike starts at 8:30 AM and usually lasts about 2 hours. Afterwards, dinner facilities are arranged for refueling and socializing. ;-)

DIRECTIONS (a bit sketchy but best I have):
From I-91:
* Take Exit 10
* Get onto Route 40 connector & stay on until the end
* At the light, take a right onto Route 10 North
* Drive 1.5 mi. & turn right onto Mt Carmel Ave.
* Hike is .5 mi. down on the left

From Wilbur Cross Parkway:
* Take Exit 61
* Go north onto Whitney Ave. for 3 mi.
* Take a right onto MT. Carmel Avenue
* Hike is .5 mi. down on the left

From I-84 to Cheshire:
* Take Route 70 South onto Route 10 South drive 5 miles
* Take a left at the light onto MT. Carmel Ave.
* Hike is .5 mi. down on the left

Active Singles is a 10 year old, non-profit Connecticut organization that brings together singles who enjoy participating in a variety of outdoor activities.

CONTACT: Charlie (organizer of Active Singles) 860-489-9611

*** There may be a $7.00 CT resident or $10 out-of-state parking fee.***

A Sleeping Giant State Park hiking map is at:
* http://dep.state.ct.u...

No official Hartford Area Hiking leadership is planned to be at this hike. Just mingle with the other Active Singles (you're one!).

NO Children or Dogs, Singles only (this doesn't mean you can't have a boyfriend or girlfriend). Wear Hiking Boots. Bring water. Optional Brunch follows each hike. Non hikers can join us at the restaurant. Call Charlie early to reserve a spot for Brunch.

For more information, see http://dep.state.ct.u...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Active Singles Hike to Sleeping Giant SP in Hamden CT
